transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Hi sir, good afternoon. Main Humara baat kar rahi thi. Awaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Hello, evarandi?
Executive: Sir, this side Humara from IndiaMART head office. Talking in GMS remix, is that right?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Sir, main account manager se senior manager baat kar rahi hu. Ankur ji actually aapka discussion hua hoga na services ke liye. To main aapko yahi keh rahi thi ki jaise ki aap issue face kar rahe hain buylead ya inquiry se related. To uske liye team work karegi, aapko guidance bhi di hogi, hai na? Baki rest koi issue to nahi hai abhi aapka? Aur koi problem vagera to nahi face kar rahe hain na?
Customer: Wo IndiaMART mein buylead ke alawa kya aur problem rehta hai?
Executive: Baki main aapko apna aap business ke liye bhi hum business ke liye juda hua hu na.
Customer: Haan ji, I understand. Buylead hi hai, buylead hi hai na main business?
Executive: Yes, main samajh rahi hu is cheez ko. Baki main aapko ye keh rahi hu ki main aapko apna number share kar de rahi hu. Senior manager bol rahi hu main. Aapko aage se kuch problem rahe ya issue rahega services ko leke, aap mujhse connect kar lena, thik hai?
Customer: Main customer care number ko call karunga, problem nahi.
Executive: Aap customer care pe aap call kar lijiyega, koi problem nahi hai but still aapka call to hamare paas divert hona hai sir. Baat aapki humse hi hogi chahe aap humse direct baat kijiye ya customer care pe kijiye. To koi benefit nahi hai, right?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To isliye main aapko apna number hai wo WhatsApp kar de rahi hu.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Thik hai?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aapko main number. Haan ji, main aapko WhatsApp kar rahi hu. Aap usi se connect kar lena humse. Koi problem isse hogi nahi sir aapko. Still kuch issue vagera rehta hai to aap bataiyega, thik hai?
Customer: Wahi hai, pehle bata dijiye na wo buylead ka problem aa raha hai, wo bada quantity karna nahi aa raha hai, wo sort out kar dijiye, baad mein dekhenge.
Executive: Haan, badi quantity ke liye jaise filter abhi jo problem aa rahi hai jo problem hai na usko sort out kar dijiye. Uske baad baat karenge.
Executive: Baki uske liye to sir filters hain jo abhi video meet pe bataya hoga Ankur ne aapko filter hai bulk order ka aur usko save karne ka bhi hai to apan save kar denge uske according pattern. Wo teen wo teen saal se wahi filter kar raha hu main. Aur iske alawa aur kuch bhi nahi hai na?
Customer: Ye naya kal kal jaan kal jaan nahi hua main. Teen saal se wahi filter ka wahi istemal kar raha hu. To ek cheez karte hain sir abhi tak use abhi abhi tak use kiya main. Abhi thik nahi hai bata raha hu, fir aap wahi ulta wahi bata rahe mujhe. Main puch raha hu aapko main puch raha hu aapko kyu wo bada quantity ka buyleads kuch bhi nahi kyu puch raha hu main?
Executive: Okay, to ek kaam karte hain sir hum, ek aur cheez kar sakte hain. Aapke jo product hai na, usme minimum order quantity ka ek option hota hai na, aap jante hi honge. Wo add kar dete hain jisme ki minimum customer ko ye dikh paye ki aap kitne tan mein kaam karte hain product mein. Jaise aapka floating fish feed hai, thik hai? Floating fish feed minimum minimum wala 10 tan 10 tan laga dijiye.
Customer: Haan, wo sare product mein ek baar mein Ankur ko bol ke paanch product hain aapke, paancho mein add kar deti hu jisse ki customer check karega ya kabhi bhi inquiry ya call post karega to wo dekh sakta hai. Customer: Namaste sir, mera naam Vikram hai.
Executive: [inaudible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing issues with buyleads.

- Customer is receiving calls for wrong products.

- Wants to sort out the buylead issue.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to add minimum order quantity.

- Agreed to add 10 tons minimum order quantity.

- Executive will check product details.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect back to the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, minimum order quantity, product details, wrong calls
